headline.main: KEY TO PEACE SEEN IN ANGLO-U.S. AMITY; Gammans, M.P., Says Future Depends on Understanding

lead_paragraph: The future of the world is dependent upon the relations between the United States and Great Britain, Captain Leonard D. Gammans, a member of the British House of Commons, declared yesterday in an interview at the Advertising Club of New York.
abstract: Capt L D Gammans (MP) sees world future dependent on Brit-US amity
snippet: The future of the world is dependent upon the relations between the United States and Great Britain, Captain Leonard D. Gammans, a member of the British House of Commons, declared yesterday in an interview at the Advertising Club of New York....
